name: Buddy
description: Buddy is a sweet, energetic boy who loves to play fetch and go on long walks. He's great with children and other dogs.

name: Luna
description: Luna is a smart, active girl who would thrive in a home with space to run and an owner who enjoys training.

name: Whiskers
description: Whiskers is a gentle, laid-back cat who loves to curl up in laps and watch the world go by.

name: Bella
description: Bella is a young, playful pup who's eager to learn and would make a great family dog with proper training.

name: Shadow
description: Shadow is a loyal, protective dog who would be perfect for an experienced owner who can provide structure and exercise.

name: Mittens
description: Mittens is a gentle, quiet cat who prefers a calm environment and would be perfect for apartment living.

name: Max
description: Max is a friendly, curious dog who loves to explore and would be great with children who can keep up with his energy.

name: Princess
description: Princess is a loving, energetic little dog who would be perfect for an adult-only home or one with older children.
